predicate.note: Frames file for 'consult' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry 36.3, other framed members include fight. Comparison with fight and meet.

roleset.name: get together with

example.name: passive, with topic
example.text: In a statement, Jaguar's board said they ``were not consulted *trace* about the (Ridley decision) in advance and were surprised at the action taken.''

example.name: active, just transitive
example.text: Jaguar was shocked by Mr. Ridley's decision, because management had believed the government wouldn't lift the golden share without *trace* consulting the company first.

roleset.note: Ignore adjectival usages like "a prominent consulting firm".
